The Oilpaper Umbrella is a Super glider in Mario Kart Tour. It is a red umbrella with a white spiral on it. The Oilpaper Umbrella offers better chances of getting Red Shells from Item Boxes and increases the number of points earned for landing hits with Red Shells.
There are four variants of the glider, namely the Lightning Oilpaper, Purple Oilpaper Umbrella, Nabbit Oilpaper Umbrella, and the Dry Bowser Umbrella.
